      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83489</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction force between the brick and the ground</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kraft zwischen dem Ziegelstein und dem 
Boden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force de frottement entre la brique et la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força da fricção entre o tijolo e a terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza di attrito fra il mattone e la terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη τριβής μεταξύ του τούβλου και του εδάφους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza de la fricción entre el ladrillo y la 
tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the friction force acting between the brick and the ground is in the opposite direction with its movement.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bricks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ground</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">opposite direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Friktion Kraft, 
die zwischen dem Ziegelstein und dem Boden fungiert, in der 
entgegengesetzten Richtung mit seiner Bewegung ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la force de 
frottement agissant entre la brique et la terre est dans la direction 
opposée avec son mouvement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a força da 
fricção que age entre o tijolo e a terra está no sentido oposto com
seu movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la forza di 
attrito che si comporta fra il mattone e la terra è nel senso opposto
con il relativo movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η δύναμη τριβής που 
ενεργεί μεταξύ του τούβλου και του εδάφους είναι στην αντίθετη 
κατεύθυνση με τη μετακίνησή της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la fuerza de la 
fricción que actúa entre el ladrillo y la tierra está en la 
dirección opuesta con su movimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziegelsteine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
